title: Elegant Kempu Kundan Gulubandi Choker
features: This Gulubandi boasts a classic South Indian design with alternating floral and heart motifs. Each motif is meticulously set with Kundan-encased CZ stones, framed by vibrant Kempu rubies and emeralds. The heart-shaped centerpiece adds a modern touch, making this a versatile piece for both traditional and contemporary styles.
description: This Kundan Gulubandi choker seamlessly blends traditional craftsmanship with modern aesthetics. The genuine Kempu rubies and emeralds add a touch of royalty, while the intricately set Kundan CZ stones provide a brilliant sparkle. Its versatility allows it to be paired with both traditional sarees and contemporary outfits, making it a timeless investment.
